name: subscribe_newsletter_footer_magento
description: Subscribe to the One Stop Market newsletter from the homepage footer using a provided email. PRECONDITION: The newsletter form must be available on the page. Successful outcome: The user is subscribed to the newsletter.

steps.description: Open the store homepage where the footer newsletter form is available.
Enter the provided email into the footer newsletter input field (name=email, id=newsletter).
Submit the newsletter form by clicking the Subscribe button.

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: Base URL with protocol (e.g., http://localhost:7770 for VWA or http://3.12.136.212:7770 for WebArena)
